title: RADS Error?
body:
Just finished a game decided to log into another account and suddenly I cant access the Launcher to lol.launcher.exe or lol.admin.launcher.exe._.  I get a message saying "Could Not Connect To The HTTP Server, Please check that your internet connection and that your firewall is not blocking access."

I've put LoL to the exceptions of my antivirus and firewall idk bout the router though, even if I turn them off it still says the message, Restarted my pc too. 

Anyone getting this?
Rito pls let me play ma game.{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 

still havent got my gift :'c

replies.body:
Hi kpopwashere.

I had the same problem a couple of mins ago and found a solution below. You should change your DNS to Google's public DNS.

Go to Control Penal > Network and Sharing Center > Change adapter settings > Right Click > Properties > Double Click Internet Protocol Version 4 > Select "Use the following DNS server addresses "
Preferred 8.8.8.8
Alternated 8.8.4.4
Click OK.

Hope this helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Pyongarie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KYJYpo0s,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2015-01-09T10:15:22.333+0000)
>
> Hi kpopwashere.
> 
> I had the same problem a couple of mins ago and found a solution below. You should change your DNS to Google's public DNS.
> 
> Go to Control Penal > Network and Sharing Center > Change adapter settings > Right Click > Properties > Double Click Internet Protocol Version 4 > Select "Use the following DNS server addresses "
> Preferred 8.8.8.8
> Alternated 8.8.4.4
> Click OK.
> 
> Hope this helps!

:( didn't work :( {{item:3070}}
What is DNS? and i dont know how to change it D;  plz help rito

A DNS is a Domain Name System. You can think of it as a Giant phone book that tells applications where to send internet traffic. For example if you type in google.com, how does your web browser know what server google exists at? The answer is it checks with a DNS to see what the address for google is and, depending on where you are, it will give your browser an address like 74.125.224.41 (you can actually bypass your DNS by just putting that IP address into your web browser, though this server is probably no where near you and will probably be pretty slow)

The reason switching to a public DNS (8.8.8.8 - 8.8.4.4 = Google) can fix this issue is they are updated much more regularly than private DNS' and are more secure, since hacking a private address is considerably easier than a corporate one like google (depending on your security settings)

Unfortunately in cases like these there are many issues that can be causing the same symptoms. If switching to a public DNS is not working for you I strongly suggest that you submit a ticket to https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new so we can help to troubleshoot an issue that may be unique to your situation.


Post Script: Thank you Pyongarie for the guide!

Hello bro, I got the same problem after shifting from using wifi to stable dongle connection, if you have the time could you please suggest me some other steps where i can manage my DNS problem, the google dns doesn't seem to work on mine, if it helps the riot support site wont even load...  thank you.

Hi DavieB, 
Thanks for your kind explanation. This issue happens to me sometimes after updating patch since my boyfriend has changed our WiFi router. He doesn't play LOL anymore so I am the one who cares... I don't think a connecting to public DNS server can resolve the issue permanently.. right?
Just follow the instruction I wrote. It works for some people like me. :)

This seems like working for some people. Hope this helps! 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0Nt3PPsgeNY
I know this is a very old thread, but i had the same issue with the new season update 6.22 and i tried to change the dns, it did not work. what should i do?
YOU ARE AMAZING, THANKS!

I'm using windows 10 and I know its my computer not allowing me ive turned firewalls off etc... any idea if I will need to update drivers or anything I tried using the default 8.8.8.8 dns and after chanign the flushed them with cmd.. still not working please someone help!!

When doing the 8888. 8844 thing, make sure you click the box saying something about validating settings upon exiting on the bottom left corner. Then press "ok". Upon exiting that, make sure you don't exit but press "close" and do that with all the other tabs. Good luck!
Omg ty Pyongarie i've been searching for help all day Ty it worked <3

Thanks this worked,
another way to fix this is 
1. right click on league
2. open file location
3. go to rads
4. then system
5. then search system cfg or something like that
6. click it and open in note pad
7. delete anything inside it (if there is anything inside it)
8. paste this
DownloadPath = /releases/live
DownloadURL = l3cdn.riotgames.com
Region = EUW
9. change the EUW to whatever region e.g OC1 for oceania
10. open the launcher again and see if it works.
this may not work
my network is good and firewall is not blocking but i have rads error pleas one tell me how solve this problem

Hey, im not sure how I fixed it now :( it's been a while now. Try sending a support ticket, and hopefully the team can help you, at the time I posted this I think it was a server problem.

Yesterday League OCE working fine. Today constant RADS errors and I've tried everything out there. I additionally found that I can not even go to the website link to re-download the game at all. Yet another mate in Melbourne is still able to log in to play and is able to download the game link to install.

I did find another thread (http://forums.oce.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=7260) and used the trace ping to help riot identify the issue. I am with TPG adsl2. Below is a pastebin of the riot-lol-results.txt file.

http://pastebin.com/yc70rShv
